description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock for the WPEFramework plugin shell interface, using Google Mock for testing purposes. It includes method overrides for various service functionalities.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface, used for unit testing interactions with the plugin shell.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature or version is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request, identified by an ID, with a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given string identifiers.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries interface by callsign and call number.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for last operation.
